title: Braum Q&A - Art & Sound [Completed]
body:
**Alright everyone, we're heading out for the day. Thanks for taking the time to speak with us!**

Hey all!

We’re the team behind Braum’s art and sounds, and we’ll be around for the next couple of hours to answer your moustachiest questions about the Heart of the Freljord. If your query leans more to [**gameplay**](http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-skins/4iUzAEEA-braum-qa-gameplay) or [**creative**](http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-skins/BkKZUcUt-braum-qa-creative-release-campaign), check out those discussions by clicking the handy links you just read. Otherwise, ask away below!

-Art maestros and licensed soundologists

---

If you would like to learn more about Braum:

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/b-splash.jpg?itok=5aVVOKTh

[Braum, the Heart of the Freljord, revealed](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-reveal/braum-heart-freljord-revealed)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5dvYxkyQFZU

[Trials of the Poro](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-preview/trials-poro)

Oktoberfest Braum Confirmed
One of my favorite authors is Nietzsche. Any chance we will see a skin based on one of the West's most influential philosophers? Was Braum's appearance in any way inspired by him?
Man I thought this skin was well on its way already! Gentleman Braum fits his personality so well!
I am curious how he would look in a suit myself? *(how would he fit?)* but what to do with the make of his shield? Any thoughts? Either way I think it is a good idea!
You could make the shield a gold and wood plaque that said Freljord Gentleman Society or something along that line

To be honest, I could see him holding a "family coat of arms". Typically it's a shield with the "family crest" on it (which would be nice to use the Ashe summoner icon image, since he's allied with Ashe's faction).
What about pool party Braum, the shield is a boogie board.
I would think something along the lines of James Bond grabbing a serving plate off a table... a huge over-sized serving plate shield!
How long did it take to go from designing him in idea and sketches to the finished product? Was he based on any community suggestions? :)

Braum took a fair amount of time to get him where he needed to be thematically. He actually started off as a female support character.

As time went on, we always make time to listen to our player, we knew that we needed another male support.

So it was decided, to change gears and make the most manly support in league!

Of course this meant he had to have a mustache and muscles to spare.
First offical gender swap skin?

> Of *coarse* this meant he had to have a mustache and muscles to spare.

And Braum does puns of damage
Are there any plans to recycle the original female support for a later champion?
Seeing his abilities,  I just can't help but think of how awesome it would be if you guys made a skin based on Captain America!
lol. Awesome skin idea~~ thx :)
Captain Avarosan Braum confirmed :D

Here are a couple skin ideas for you...
War of the Northern Front Braum, basically dressed up like a Cossack. 
Swedish Massage Braum, Yup...Braum in nothing but a towel, swinging a massage table around. 
Gentleman Braum, which I believe has already been mentioned.
Strongman Braum, your classic carnival/circus favorite.
How about a WWII themed fighter pilot entitled "Braums Away"? Have him use a wing tip or a bomb for a shield. 


Soooo.......yeah, I was bored lol.
lol. i am saving these ideas for later skin ideation meeting :)

Is there a reson his unbreakable shield has a horn broken off of the ram?

Aside from that I think he looks awesome!

Yes I can see how that may be a little confusing. 

It was designed that way for interest and to help break the silhouette of the shield from game height. It adds a nice story telling element that helps provide visual interest.

We also thought it gave a little story, how did it break off if was supposedly unbreakable?
The lore states the shield wad originally a door Braum was trying to destroy to save a child

But the issue here is that it was made very clear that the door was indestructible. Perhaps the horn was broken off before the door was enchanted, or maybe just the main slab cannot be damaged. Maybe the enchantment is wearing off?
If Braum was to get another skin what direction would riots design team head with?Can you think of anything you know you want to see him come out with?
I vote for wrestler Braum! just like hollywood Hogan but he would carry a half smashed table instead of shield :)

I'm not sure that a Hollywood Braum wood work considering you have a Vandal Gragas that already has the vest and bandanna. Just my two cents, but either way you guys have a better idea of what's going on.

I really love how Braum looks. Great job on him :)  
I have one question. Does movement animation with Poro strolling on Braum's shield have any special condition to occur or it's random? If it's random, frequency seems a bit to low.

The little easter egg that we had to remove, it ended up effecting gameplay and if Braum is ever used in the LCS this could be a serious distraction :( It was set to be random and only occurred like once every 1000 clicks.
That explains why I saw it like 3 times. Oh well, now I'm sad. What about smuggling it as idle animation?
In what way is this a distraction? For Kha and Pulsefire Ezreal, isn't the sporadic flight in their walking animations a much bigger deal?

Can Braum please have the quote "Like a good neighbor, Braum is there," pretty please? I think it really fits into his personality and is a bit of a pop-culture reference that many people will enjoy (state farm insurance, the name itself is fitting because Braum is from/lives on a farm). He can say this when he dashes to a teammate! 

Maybe this idea could even become an "Insurance Agent Braum" skin or something (with possible product tie-ins with the companies themselves)? Braum literally covers teammates when they mess up. "That is Braum's stand. Are you in good hands?"

who is Braum's voice actor?

What were the inspirations behind Braum's look?

There appears to be a heavy influence from a certain animation series from Japan.

Braum's look had many influences from different popular archetypes ranging from movies, games and anime.

We really wanted to hit the strong man, yet jovial thematic, while giving him a look that was unique to league.
Ummmmmmmm how much of it was also Angus the puncher and lu bu

Braum's VO is incredibly rich and expansive, a step up from anything we've seen yet, including legendary and ultimate skins. Can we expect to see this level of care and sheer amount of content for future champion releases and visual updates?
Yes.. We will always try to add more contents and new stuffs for future champions. (Aniamtion, VFX, model and sound)
